name: Railgunners - Demo
description:
This is a beta demo, some things may not work properly.

Railgunners is a story driven shooter, in a mix of shmup and runner genre.
Fight your way through hundreds of enemy ships, and help humanity fight back against the alien invasion!

There are 3 playable characters to choose from, each one with a unique experimental ship, armed with powerful guns and special abilities!

Controls:

Keyboard:
Move: Arrow keys
Shoot: X
Pause: Escape
Select: X, Enter, Space
Jump Dialogs/Launch: Space
Cancel/Back: C

Joystick:
Move: D-Pad or Analog stick
Shoot: A
Pause: Start
Select: A, Y
Jump Dialogs/Launch: Y
Cancel/Back: B

PRESS ALT+ENTER FOR FULL SCREEN

Download and install DirectX to play this game: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/details.aspx?id=35
